title: My pixel 3 keeps turning back on every time I power off.
content:
Hi. As the title says, every time I attempt to power off the phone the phone restarts. 

I tried resetting the phone and the same thing keeps occuring. 

Battery drain is an issue too. Going from 100 to 25 while remaining pretty much idle. Battery manager didn't state what the battery drain could be attributed to. 

Seems to all have occurred after the march update. 

Thanks.
